name: Procedure Code 18 Date
description: The date on which the procedure was performed. The date associated with the procedure identified in the corresponding procedure code.

fhirMapping.note: Procedure Date is stored in conjunction with it's related Procedure Code and Procedure Code Version within the eob.procedure[N].procedureCodeableConcept.coding. Ie.. Procedure Date 1 will be stored with the Procedure Code 1 etc…
